original_title: Blue's Clues: Blue's Big Treasure Hunt
overview: Get ready for two searches in one! Blue and Steve are searching for a hidden treasure. Steve is playing Blue's Clues to discover who set up this special hunt! The adventure starts when the map is opened and it doesn't end until Blue and Steve discover the secret treasure!
tagline: Join Blue and Steve as they search for a hidden treasure!
title: Blue's Clues: Blue's Big Treasure Hunt
